Transparency
============

* [Home](https://ci.yelm.wa.us/)
* [Government](https://ci.yelm.wa.us/government/index.php)
* Transparency

Sub Menu

Related Pages

* [Resolutions](https://lf.yelmwa.gov/weblink/Browse.aspx?id=17&dbid=0)

* [City of Yelm Title VI](https://ci.yelm.wa.us/government/transparency/title_vi_non-discrimination_statement.php)
* [Annexation in Yelm](https://ci.yelm.wa.us/government/transparency/annexation_in_yelm.php)
* [Annexation in Yelm Frequently Asked Questions](https://ci.yelm.wa.us/government/transparency/annexation_in_yelm_frequently_asked_questions.php)

Yelm’s push for transparency is driven by a desire to increase accountability and foster community engagement. Through clean audits, easy-to-read budget documents, strong public records policies, and purposeful organizational restructuring, the city is making strides to be more open, responsible, and accessible.

![icon](https://ci.yelm.wa.us/_assets_/images/share.png)
